<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The fair value of the warrant liability
	is re-measured at each reporting period and recorded as a gain or loss on fair value of warrant liability. As of December 31,
	2015 and December 31, 2014 the fair value of warrant liability was $140,549 and $1,067,674, respectively. For the years ended
	December 31, 2015 and 2014, the Company recognized a gain of $927,125 and $106,278, respectively, on the change in the fair value
	of the warrant liability.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

	the Black-Scholes pricing model with the following assumptions as of December 31, 2015 and 2014:

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In conjunction with the securities
	offering transaction, the Company issued three year warrants to investment bankers to purchase 40,000 shares of the Company&rsquo;s
	common stock at $6.33 per share. The aggregate fair value of the warrants was $94,982, which was recognized as a share-based compensation
	and resulted in an increase of additional paid-in capital. As such compensation was offering cost, it resulted in a reduction
	in additional paid-in capital. Hence, such transaction had no net impact on the Company&rsquo;s financial position as of December
	31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
	F-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	31
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage100"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	HIGHPOWER INTERNATIONAL, INC. AND SUBSIDIARIES
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(Stated in US Dollars)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	20.
</B>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Defined contribution plan
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	Full-time
	employees of the Company in the PRC participate in a government mandated defined contribution plan, pursuant to which certain
	pension benefits, medical care, employee housing fund and other welfare benefits are provided to employees. Chinese labor regulations
	require that the PRC operating subsidiaries of the Company make contributions to the government for these benefits based on certain
	percentages of the employees&rsquo; salaries. Except for pension benefits, medical care, employee housing fund and other welfare
	benefits mentioned above, the Company has no legal obligation for the benefits beyond the contributions made.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	The total
	amounts for such employee benefits, which were expensed as incurred, were $1,868,879 and $1,489,130 for the years ended December
	31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	21.
</B>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Non-controlling interest
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	GZ Highpower
	is the Company&rsquo;s majority-owned subsidiary which is consolidated in the Company&rsquo;s financial statements with a non-controlling
	interest recognized. GZ Highpower is engaged in processing, marketing and research of battery materials.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	On May 15,
	2013, GZ Highpower increased its paid-in capital from RMB15,000,000 ($2,381,293) to RMB30,000,000 ($4,807,847).SZ Highpower holds
	60% of the equity interest of GZ Highpower, and four founding management members of GZ Highpower hold the remaining 40%.On November
	13, 2014, GZ Highpower increased its paid-in capital from RMB30,000,000 ($4,898,119) to RMB40,000,000 ($6,530,825) and the additional
	capital of RMB10,000,000 was contributed by SZ Highpower. As of December 31, 2014, SZ Highpower holds 70% of the equity interest
	of GZ Highpower, and four founding management members of GZ Highpower hold the remaining 30%.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	As of December
	31, 2015 and 2014, non-controlling interest related to GZ Highpower in the consolidated balance sheet was $853,483 and $1,307,239,
	respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	For the years
	ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, non-controlling interest related to GZ Highpower in the consolidated statements of operations
	was loss of $393,812 and $152,369, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>

	The Company
	has no capital commitments as of December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
<U>
	Contingencies
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	On January
	14, 2016, FirsTrust China, Ltd filed an amended complaint in the Delaware Chancery Court (amending its initial complaint filed
	February 25, 2015) naming Highpower as the defendant asserting a cause of action for breach of contract and conversion of stock,
	and seeking damages in the form of issuance of 150,000 shares or the value of such shares, plus interest thereon, attorneys&rsquo;
	fees and costs and expenses. On February 4, 2016, Highpower filed an answer, affirmative defenses and counterclaim against FirsTrust
	asserting claims for equitable rescission, declaratory relief and breach of contract, and seeking rescission of the contract,
	return of the 200,000 warrants and 150,000 shares of Highpower stock previously issued to FirsTrust, plus interest, attorneys&rsquo;
	fees and costs and expenses. The Company believes that it has meritorious defenses to this claim and intends to defend the claim
	vigorously.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	(Stated in US Dollars)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

</TD>

	23.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Segment information
</B>
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	The reportable
	segments are components of the Company that offer different products and are separately managed, with separate financial information
	available that is separately evaluated regularly by the Company&rsquo;s chief operating decision maker (&ldquo;CODM&rdquo;), the
	Chief Executive Officer, in determining the performance of the business. The Company categorizes its business into three reportable
	segments, namely (i) Lithium Batteries; (ii) Ni-MH Batteries; and (iii) New Materials.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0">
	The CODM evaluates
	performance based on each reporting segment&rsquo;s net sales, cost of sales, gross profit and total assets. Net sales, cost of
	sales, gross profit and total assets by segments is set out as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 30.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.6PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	Dear Sirs
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	Offer Letter -
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	Invoice Discounting / Factoring Agreement
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	With reference to our recent discussions,
	we are pleased to offer to provide you with debts purchase services. The services will be made available to you on the terms and
	subject to conditions set out in this letter as well as in the Invoice Discounting / Factoring Agreement between you and us (incorporating,
	amongst other things, our Standard Conditions For Invoice Discounting / Factoring
<B>
	(&ldquo;Standard Conditions&rdquo;)
</B>
	(together
	constituting the
<B>
	&ldquo;Invoice Discounting / Factoring Agreement
</B>
</FONT>
	&rdquo;
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	)).
</B>
	These
	services are subject to review at any time and, in any event by 15 July 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	This is the Offer Letter referred
	to in the Invoice Discounting /
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	Factoring Agreement between
	you and us. An expression used in this letter shall have the meaning given to it in the Invoice Discounting / Factoring Agreement,
	if such expression appears there.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SERVICES
	OFFERED BY THE BANK
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; COLOR: #515151">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	*
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	Credit Management -
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	we
	provide services in respect of the collection of Debts and/or maintenance of a sales ledger in the manner from time to time determined
	by the Bank.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; COLOR: #515151">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	*
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	Debts shall be purchased on a disclosed basis as set out in Section E below.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 1IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; COLOR: #515151">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	*
</FONT>

	Debts are purchased on a With Recourse basis.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	E.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOTICE
	OF ASSIGNMENT FOR DEBTS AND COLLECTION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Debts of all Customers will be purchased on a disclosed basis (that is, giving the notices of assignment for the Debts) except
	as otherwise agreed by us in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Debts shall be collected and paid into the designated account maintained by you with us and held on trust for us. However, we
	have the overriding right at any time to direct any Debt to be paid directly to us.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	F.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;DOCUMENTS
	REQUIRED
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;You
	shall provide us with the following documents in each case in the form and substance satisfactory to us:-
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the
	Invoice Discounting /
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: GRAY">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	Factoring Agreement made between you
	and us;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a
	certified extract of your board resolutions approving and authorizing the execution, delivery and performance of this letter and
	the Invoice Discounting / Factoring Agreement and designating the Authorized Person(s) in connection with the Invoice Discounting
	/ Factoring Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all
	security documents referred to in Section G below; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;such
	other documents, terms or evidence that we may require from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	No request for any Prepayment may be submitted
	prior to our receipt of the above documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	following supporting documents are required in relation to each Debt:-
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A
	copy of the confirmed purchase order (if applicable);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A
	copy of the invoice endorsed with and/or accompanied by a note in the form approved by us stating our interest as assignee; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Evidence
	of Delivery of the Goods satisfactory to us.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
	we agree, you may provide us with the lists of the Debts (which shall include the names of Customers, invoices numbers, invoices
	amounts, due dates of the Debts as well as such other information as required by us) in lieu of the copies of the invoices in respect
	of the Debts. Notwithstanding this, you shall at any time, upon request by us, promptly provide us with the copies of the invoices
	evidencing the Debts.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	G.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECURITY
	AND OTHER DOCUMENTATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	As security for your obligations and liabilities
	to us under, inter alia, this letter and the Invoice Discounting / Factoring Agreement, we require to hold the following:-
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	I. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A Guarantee (limited to USD8,000,000.-) together
	with default interest and other costs and expenses from Shenzhen Highpower Technology Co Ltd, Springpower Technology (Shenzhen)
	Co Ltd and Huizhou Highpower Technology Co. Ltd together with Board Resolution in substantially the form of that enclosed with
	this facility letter. We enclose our standard form of Guarantee for your completion and return.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">

	G.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECURITY
	AND OTHER DOCUMENTATION (CONT&rsquo;D)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #515151">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">

	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	A
	Guarantee (limited to USD8,000,000.-) together with default interest and other costs and expenses from Pan Dangyu. We enclose our
	standard form of Guarantee for your completion and return.
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #515151">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	An
	assignment of credit insurance policy issued by Sinosure in favour of our Bank for the factored customers. Any changes to insurer&rsquo;s
	cover must be notified to us immediately.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	To comply with the Code of Banking Practice
	and guidance given by the Courts, the Bank needs to obtain your consent before it can provide a copy or summary of the facility,
	or information on your outstanding liabilities to the Bank, to any guarantor or other third party providing security (the
<B>
	&ldquo;Surety&rdquo;)
</B>
	or to the Surety&rsquo;s advisors. In addition, if the Bank is obliged to make any formal demand for repayment because you have
	failed to settle an amount due following our customary reminder, the Bank will also need to provide the Surety with a copy of its
	demand letter. Whether or not the Bank has made the demand, the Bank will also need to provide the Surety with a copy of the latest
	statement of account and/or to give the Surety details of your outstanding liabilities to the Bank, whether actual or contingent.
	By accepting this letter, you are deemed to have consented to the Bank providing any of the aforesaid documents or information
	to the Surety, to the Surety&rsquo;s solicitors and other professional advisers. Please note that if this consent is not given,
	the Bank will be unable to proceed with the transaction.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	Please note that all costs and expenses (including
	legal fees) incurred by us in connection with the extension of these facilities and any matters arising therefrom are to be reimbursed
	by you on demand.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	H.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SPECIAL
	TERMS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Please
	note that Section 83 of the Banking Ordinance has imposed on us as a bank certain limitations on transactions with persons related
	to our directors or employees. In acknowledging this letter, you should advise us whether you are in any way related to any of
	our directors or employees within the meaning of Section 83 and in the absence of such advice we will assume that you are not so
	related. We would also ask, should you become so related subsequent to acknowledging this letter, that you immediately advise us
	in writing.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless
	expressed in writing from you to the contrary, we may provide any information relating to any of your accounts with us and any
	facilities we may provide to you from time to time or their conduct or any other information concerning your relationship with
	us to any other company or office which at the relevant time belongs to or is part of the HSBC Group.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	3. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Please note that our standard service charges
	arc stipulated in the Bank&rsquo;s Tariff which is accessible at http://www.commercial.hsbc.com.hk/l/2/commercial/customer_service/tariffs.
	We will provide you with a hard copy of the Tariff at your request.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
	letter is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
	the event from time to time that the actual amount of Prepayment (as defined in the Invoice Discounting/ Factoring Agreement) exceeds
	the Availability, we may, at our sole and absolute discretion, debit such excess amount from your account(s) maintained with us.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;First
	drawdown is subject to successful pre-ledgcr debt verification with buyers or first buyer payment to the trustee account, whichever
	is earlier.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	H. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SPECIAL TERMS (CON&rsquo;T)
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Acknowledgement
	of notification letter from your customer(s)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	required.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
	invoices billed to the factored buyers must bear our standard assignment clause
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Copies
	of all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	invoices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	billed to the factored buyers must be submitted
	to HSBC within 30 days after issuance, along with the relevant Proof of Delivery (POD) and Purchase Orders (if any).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No
	selective assignment, i.e. all invoices including credit notes and debit notes to the proposed factoring buyers have to be assigned
	to HSBC.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

	invoices/ tooling invoices and debit notes will

	for financing.

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	12.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Contacts
	(valid email addresses and mailing addresses) of the factored buyers must be provided to us for debt verification and collection
	purposes.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	13.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notification
	letters (format and wording
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	be supplied by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	us)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	to your customer(s) shall be prepared under your company&rsquo;s letterhead and returned to
	us for our despatch.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	14.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;You
	will
</FONT>
	be
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	required for so long as these facilities are available to you to comply with the following
	undertaking(s)/covenant(s). Your compliance or otherwise with the following undertaking(s) /covenant(s) will not in any way prejudice
	or affect our right to suspend, withdraw or make demand in respect of the whole or any part of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	facilities
	made available to you at any time. By signing this letter, you expressly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	acknowledge that we
	may suspend, withdraw or make demand for repayment of the whole or any part of the facilities at any time notwithstanding the fact
	that the following undertaking(s)/covenant(s)are included in this letter and whether or not you are in breach of any such undertaking(s)/covenant(s).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	The Borrower, Hong Kong Highpower Technology
	Co Limited, hereby undertakes factored turnover of no less than USD10,000,000.- per annum. Otherwise, commitment fee equal to
	the shortfall amount (i.e. USD10,000,000.- minus factored invoice volume) times service charge of 0.15% on invoice value will
	be borne by the Client and calculated on pro-rata basis at the end of each quarter. Any applicable commitment fee will be added
	to the FIU balance not later than 15th day of the following month. Refund of commitment fee will be arranged if the minimum undertaking
	requirement for USD10,000,000.- can be met in 12 months from the facility commencement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	A set up fee of USD5,000.- will be charged to
	the debit of your current account upon receipt of your acceptance to this offer letter.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	Please arrange for your authorised signatories
	to sign and return to us the duplicate copy of this letter with Appendix to signify your understanding and acceptance of the terms
	and conditions under which debts purchase services are offered.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	This offer will remain open for
	acceptance until the close
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	business on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	September
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	and
	if not accepted by that date will be deemed to have lapsed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	We look forward to the development of a mutually
	beneficial and lasting relationship.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	Yours faithfully For and on behalf of
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation
	Limited
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/29/0001144204-16-090977_TEX10-14PG5.JPG" ALT="">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	Vice President /ac
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">

	set out above. For and on behalf of

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/29/0001144204-16-090977_TEX10-14PG6.JPG" ALT="">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_52"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
<U>
	APPENDIX; DETAILS
	OF BENCHMARK RATES
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 17%; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	Benchmark
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 2%; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21%; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	Applicable Currency
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 3%; PADDING-BOTTOM: 1PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 57%; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	Definition of Benchmark
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="PADDING-LEFT: 3.05PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #303030">
	London Interbank Offered Rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: GRAY">
	(LIBOR) *
<SUP>
	and 1
</SUP>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	CHF
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	EUR
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	GBP
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	JPY
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	USD
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&ldquo;LIBOR&rdquo;
</B>
	means, in relation
	to any advance, the applicable Screen Rate at or around 11:00 am London time two Business Days (or such other time or day as determined
	by the Bank if the market practice differs) before the proposed date of advance and, if any such rate is below zero, LIBOR will
	be deemed to be zero.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&ldquo;Business Day&rdquo;
</B>
	means a day
	other than a Saturday or Sunday on which banks are open for general business in London.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&ldquo;Screen Rate&rdquo;
</B>
	means the Relevant
	Administrator&rsquo;s Interest Settlement Rate for the relevant currency and period displayed on the appropriate page of the Reuters
	screen provided that (a) if in the Bank&rsquo;s sole determination its funding cost is in excess of LIBOR, the Bank may specify
	the cost of funding any facility or financial arrangement; or (b) if the screen page is replaced, not available or such service
	ceases to be available, the Bank may specify another page or service displaying the appropriate rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
<B>
	&ldquo;Relevant Administrator&rdquo;
</B>
	means ICE Benchmark Administration Limited or any other person to whom the administrator function of the LIBOR fixing process is
	transferred from time to time.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; COLOR: #303030">
	Note:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 40.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: -40.5PT; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; COLOR: #303030">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 40.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	Interpolated rates, which refers to rate calculated using
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	linear
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	interpolation
	method
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	recommended by The international Swaps and
	Derivatives Association (ISDA) for situation where there is no current quote available for below
	maturities:-
</FONT>
<BR>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	&bull; LIBOR:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	weeks,
	4 months,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	months,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	months,
	8 months, 9 months, 10 months and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #515151">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #303030">
	11
	months
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 40.5PT; TEXT-INDENT: -40.5PT; COLOR: #303030">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; COLOR: #303030">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 40.5PT">
	*
</TD>
<TD>
	For tenors where fixing is not published by the relevant administrator and the interpolated rate does not apply, the benchmark
	rate shall be the rate as specified by the Bank in its sole discretion as its cost of funding the relevant facility or financial
	arrangement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">

	of 6
