<A NAME="eolPage175"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 8
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The term of the guaranty hereunder is from
	the date of effective to two years after expiration of the debts hereunder (including the maturity of extension period).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 9
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The guaranty obligations under this contract
	shall not subject to be affected by any change for the terms and conditions of master contract agreed by both creditor and debtor
	(including but not limited to amendments, supplements, and cancellations). If the creditor and debtor agree to extension or delay
	the performance of the obligations hereunder, the contract hereunder shall continue to be valid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In the event of the creditor transfers
	its credit right to others in the period of guaranty according to the law, the guarantor continues to assume the guaranty responsibility
	within the scope of the guaranty.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 10
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The guarantor makes the following commitment
	to the creditor unconditionally and irrevocably: if the debtor fails to or delays to fulfill the obligations of master contract,
	or confirm the invalidity of the master contract in certain reason, or due to the guarantor fails to or delays to perform any clause
	hereunder leading to a loss to the creditor, all of above shall be a debt payable for the guarantor to the creditor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 11
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Whatever reasons leading to the master
	contract invalid in law or part of terms invalid, the guarantor shall still assume the guaranty responsibility for the debtor&rsquo;s
	repayment liability in accordance with the terms listed hereunder. The guarantor pledge to monitor the debtor to use the loans
	(facility), in the event of the debtor change the purpose of the loan, the guarantor shall still assume the guaranty responsibilities.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any tolerance, grace or postpone the exercise
	of any right preferential by the creditor to the guarantor under this contract, shall not affect, damage, or restrict the creditor&rsquo;s
	all rights in accordance with the contract hereunder, laws and regulations, and normative documents, shall not deem as give up
	the rights and benefit under this contract, and shall not affect any obligations assumed by the guarantor under this contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 12
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If there is any collateral security except
	this guarantee under this contract, the guarantor is willing to perform the joint guaranty responsibility prior to collateral security
	on all guaranty debts.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage176"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 13
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The guarantor is an entity established
	in accordance with the laws, is qualified to identify the contract hereunder and perform joint guaranty responsibility. In addition,
	signing this contract has obtained empowerment thereof, and the process of performing the contract has been completed.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 14
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The guarantor to sign and perform this
	contract is its real intension, is true and effective and legal, shall not affected by any relationship of any party hereunder
	and others or other any events.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 15
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The debts hereunder has the equal position
	with guarantor&rsquo;s other debts, shall be in the same compensation sequence.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 16
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the guarantor enters into the counter
	guarantee contract with the debtor upon this contract, this counter guarantee contract shall not damage the creditor&rsquo;s any
	interests, and when the guarantor&rsquo;s compensation arising from the counter guarantee contract and the creditor&rsquo;s claim
	are in the same sequence, the creditor shall be compensated prior to the guarantor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The guarantor shall not request the debtor
	to set up a counter guarantee by way of property pledge as to the obligations assumed by the debtor hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 17
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The guarantor&rsquo;s responsibility shall
	decrease gradually with the decrease of the debts hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 18
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The guarantor shall provide the true, complete,
	valid financial statement and other relevant materials and information as required by the creditor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 19
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In the event of guarantor change residence,
	mailing address, telephone number, the scope of business, and the legal representative, shall notice the creditor in written within
	10 days from the date of change events occurred.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 20
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If notary organ grant enforceable potency
	to this contract, guarantor agrees to be enforced and gives up the right of defense.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4; VALUE: 2 -->

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 21: The Application of Laws
	and Resolution of Dispute
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The signing, effectiveness, interpretation,
	performance and settlement of disputes of this contract shall apply for the People's Republic of China's laws. If there are any
	disputes based on this agreement, the contracting parties could attempt to resolve them through consultation. If negotiation fails,
	shall resolve the disputes according to the following way of&nbsp;
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Institute
	legal proceeding to the court where the creditor located.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 22
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This contract and any modifications and
	supplement of it enter into force upon the date when it is signed or sealed and affixed with official seals by the legal representative
	or entrusted agents of both parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 23: Other Items Appointed by
	Both Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The things which are not mentioned in this
	contract should be explained and settled according to relevant laws, administrative laws and regulations, normative documents and
	the related regulations of Bank of Jiangsu.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 24
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This agreement is in triplicate, Party
	A has one copy, Party B has two copies, three copies have the same legal effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Guarantor (stamp): /s/ [COMPANY SEAL]
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Legal representative or agent:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Creditor (stamp): /s/ [COMPANY SEAL]
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Legal Representative or agent:
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	MAXIMUM AMOUNT GUARANTY CONTRACT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Contract No.: BZ161215000024
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Guarantor:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Icon Energy System Company Limited
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Address:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Block A, 4/F, Jinmeiwei Industrial
	Park, Guanlan Hi-tech Industrial Park, Shangkeng Community, Guanlan Town, Baoan District, Shenzhen
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Creditor:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Bank of Jiangsu, Shenzhen Sub-branch.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Address:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4011, Shennan Road, Futian District,
	Shenzhen.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	In order to warranty the performance of debts
	under item one of this contract, the guarantor provides the warranty to the creditor voluntarily, and the two parties entered into
	this contract after equal negotiation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 1: Master Contract
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The master contract hereunder is&nbsp;
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The creditor and the debtor
<U>
	&nbsp;
<B>
	Springpower
	Technology (Shenzhen) Company Limited
</B>
</U>
	&nbsp;entered into this contract of maximum amount comprehensive credit line whose
	number is&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	SX 161215000332
</U>
</B>
	, and has or will enter into the separate facility business contract, as well as amendments
	and supplements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The creditor and the debtor&nbsp;
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	&nbsp;,
	from&nbsp;
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	&nbsp;year
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	month
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	day&nbsp;
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	&nbsp;to
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	&nbsp;year
<U>
	&nbsp;
</U>
	month
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	day
	, entered into the contracts of loans, bank acceptance drafts, trade financing, letter of guarantee, funds business, and other
	agreement, as well as amendments and supplements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 2: Primary Credit and Period
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Except the period determined or agreed separately
	in accordance with the laws, the actual credit under the master contract consists of the primary credit of the contract in the
	below period:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;From the effective date of &ldquo;maximum
	amount comprehensive credit line contract&rdquo; in article one to the expiration date of facility period stipulated in this contract
	and amendments or supplements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; From ___ year __ month ___ day __ to __
	year __ month __ day under article one of this contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage179"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 3: Guarantee Coverage
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The scope of guaranty of creditor hereunder
	covers all debts occurred under this contract by the debtor, including but not limited to principals, interest expenses, compounded
	interests, penalties, processing fees, default expenses, damage compensation, legal fees, escrow fees, taxation expenses, arbitration
	fees, travel fees, assessment fees, auction fees, property preservation fees, compulsory execution fees and other expenses for
	realization of the creditor&rsquo;s right.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 4: Maximum Amount of the Guaranty
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The maximum amount which the guarantee assumed
	hereunder is at most no more than&nbsp;
<U>
	RMB 15 million only
</U>
	. The maximum amount of guaranty hereon is loan principal balance
	by total amount (means line of credit deducting the part of cash deposit) of use of loans and facility actually under the master
	contract signed between creditor and debtor and in the period as mentioned in the contract deducting the part of repayment, excluding
	the proceeds of payable except the principals stipulated in Article 3, such as interest expenses and penalties, etc., but the guarantee
	shall still assume the joint liquidated liability.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor agrees that the debtor can recycle
	the loans under master contract, and agrees that the debtor can adjust the credit line of all kinds of loans within the line of
	credit hereunder, and the guarantor shall assume the joint guarantee liability.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 5
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor has read the contract comprehensively
	and carefully and fully understands the master contract entered into between creditor and debtor, upon the request of guarantor,
	the creditor has made the terms interpretation accordingly as for the master contract and the contract hereunder, and the guarantor
	are fully aware of and understands the whole terms content of master contract and the contract hereunder, and signed this contract
	with true willing. The guarantor is fully aware of the legal consequence for the conclusion and performance of the master contract
	and the contract hereunder may give rise to, and fully confirms the obligations related to this contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 6
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor shall assume the responsibilities
	for all debts owed by the debtor to the creditor under the master contract, including the debts arising from the prepayment requested
	by the creditor. After received the written notice sent by creditor, the guarantor shall perform the settlement responsibilities
	according to the time, kinds of currency, amount, and method of settlement specified by the creditor, and commit to the creditor
	that the creditor has the right to deduct all amount of guaranty from the guarantor&rsquo;s account when the creditor deems appropriate,
	if the deducted proceeds is foreign currency, the currency shall be calculated according to the bid price published by the creditor
	at the deducted date.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->

<A NAME="eolPage180"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 7
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantee obligation of the guarantor
	(including the inheritor, assignee, and conservator of the guarantor) need continuity under this contract, shall not affected by
	the change of the guarantor or the debtor (including but not limited to merger, split, recombination,
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #434343">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
	conduct
	title transaction or transactions of managerial authority by way of lease, contract, and so on). If the debtor&rsquo;s subject
	qualification ceases to exist before clear off the loans hereunder, or the debtor declares that its subject qualification cease
	within six month from the date clear off all of loans leading to its foregoing repayment activity invalid, the guarantor&rsquo;s
	warranty obligations is still effective.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 8
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The term of the guaranty hereunder is from
	the date of effective to two years after expiration of the debts hereunder (including the maturity of extension period).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 9
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guaranty obligations under this contract
	shall not subject to be affected by any change for the terms and conditions of master contract agreed by both creditor and debtor
	(including but not limited to amendments, supplements, and cancellations). If the creditor and debtor agree to extension or delay
	the performance of the obligations hereunder, the contract hereunder shall continue to be valid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	In the event of the creditor transfers its
	credit right to others in the period of guaranty according to the law, the guarantor continues to assume the guaranty responsibility
	within the scope of the guaranty.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 10
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor makes the following commitment
	to the creditor unconditionally and irrevocably: if the debtor fails to or delays to fulfill the obligations of master contract,
	or confirm the invalidity of the master contract in certain reason, or due to the guarantor fails to or delays to perform any clause
	hereunder leading to a loss to the creditor, all of above shall be a debt payable for the guarantor to the creditor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 11
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Whatever reasons leading to the master contract
	invalid in law or part of terms invalid, the guarantor shall still assume the guaranty responsibility for the debtor&rsquo;s repayment
	liability in accordance with the terms listed hereunder. The guarantor pledge to monitor the debtor to use the loans (facility),
	in the event of the debtor change the purpose of the loan, the guarantor shall still assume the guaranty responsibilities.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<A NAME="eolPage181"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Any tolerance, grace or postpone the exercise
	of any right preferential by the creditor to the guarantor under this contract, shall not affect, damage, or restrict the creditor&rsquo;s
	all rights in accordance with the contract hereunder, laws and regulations, and normative documents, shall not deem as give up
	the rights and benefit under this contract, and shall not affect any obligations assumed by the guarantor under this contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 12
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If there is any collateral security except
	this guarantee under this contract, the guarantor is willing to perform the joint guaranty responsibility prior to collateral security
	on all guaranty debts.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 13
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor is an entity established in
	accordance with the laws, is qualified to identify the contract hereunder and perform joint guaranty responsibility. In addition,
	signing this contract has obtained empowerment thereof, and the process of performing the contract has been completed.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 14
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor to sign and perform this contract
	is its real intension, is true and effective and legal, shall not affected by any relationship of any party hereunder and others
	or other any events.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 15
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The debts hereunder has the equal position
	with guarantor&rsquo;s other debts, shall be in the same compensation sequence.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 16
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If the guarantor enters into the counter guarantee
	contract with the debtor upon this contract, this counter guarantee contract shall not damage the creditor&rsquo;s any interests,
	and when the guarantor&rsquo;s compensation arising from the counter guarantee contract and the creditor&rsquo;s claim are in the
	same sequence, the creditor shall be compensated prior to the guarantor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor shall not request the debtor
	to set up a counter guarantee by way of property pledge as to the obligations assumed by the debtor hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 17
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor&rsquo;s responsibility shall
	decrease gradually with the decrease of the debts hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4; VALUE: 2 -->

<A NAME="eolPage182"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 18
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The guarantor shall provide the true, complete,
	valid financial statement and other relevant materials and information as required by the creditor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 19
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	In the event of guarantor change residence,
	mailing address, telephone number, the scope of business, and the legal representative, shall notice the creditor in written within
	10 days from the date of change events occurred.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 20
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	If notary organ grant enforceable potency
	to this contract, guarantor agrees to be enforced and gives up the right of defense.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 21: The Application of Laws
	and Resolution of Dispute
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The signing, effectiveness, interpretation,
	performance and settlement of disputes of this contract shall apply for the People's Republic of China's laws. If there are any
	disputes based on this agreement, the contracting parties could attempt to resolve them through consultation. If negotiation fails,
	shall resolve the disputes according to the following way of&nbsp;
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;:
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Institute legal proceeding
	to the court where the creditor located.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 22
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	This contract and any modifications and supplement
	of it enter into force upon the date when it is signed or sealed and affixed with official seals by the legal representative or
	entrusted agents of both parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 23: Other Items Appointed by
	Both Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	The things which are not mentioned in this
	contract should be explained and settled according to relevant laws, administrative laws and regulations, normative documents and
	the related regulations of Bank of Jiangsu.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Article 24
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	This agreement is in triplicate, Party A has
	one copy, Party B has two copies, three copies have the same legal effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Guarantor (stamp):&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;/s/ [COMPANY SEAL]
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Legal representative or agent:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Whereas Party B applies Party A for a comprehensive
	credit line, in accordance with the
<I>
	Contract Law
</I>
	and other relevant laws and regulations, Party A and Party B hereby make
	and enter into this Contract upon consensus through consultation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Article 1 Credit Line and Category
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Amount of comprehensive credit line: &nbsp;Party A agrees to grant to Party B a comprehensive credit line of (Currency)
<U>
	RMB
</U>
	(in figures)
<U>
	70,000,000.00
</U>
	Yuan (in words)
<U>
	seventy million Yuan only
</U>
	. This line is applicable to multiple-currency credit. The exchange rate of currencies other than RMB shall be converted according to the foreign exchange rate published by Party A when the specific business occurs.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The period of the comprehensive credit line follows the following
<U>
	(1)
</U>
	:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;_____Year(s) _____
	month(s), calculated from the date when the Contract comes into force.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	During the credit period, the credit line
	(X) can be recycled ( ) cannot be recycled, but the sum of the balances of all the credit categories within the credit line shall
	not exceed the amount of the comprehensive credit line. When the credit period expires, the unused balance shall become automatically
	invalid.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Credit period means the occurrence period
	of the specific credit under a line (i.e. the period for determining the debt). The start date of the specific credit under the
	line must be included in the credit period and the termination date of the specific credit may exceed the credit period. The start
	date and termination date of the specific credit shall accord with the specific credit business contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage184"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The credit granting method of this credit line shall include but not be limited to:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Loan bank lending, bill acceptance and discount,
	overdraft, factoring, security, loan commitment and opening of L/C.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The category/credit granting method, amount, interest rate, tariff and term of the specific credit under the line shall accord with the single credit contract and IOU or other credit vouchers.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Transfer of credit under the line.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	Party B agrees to transfer
	the credit line to the following a third party to use (in other words, the following object may use the credit line), and Party
	B shall undertake the joint guarantee liability for the principal, interest, default interest and compound interest of all the
	debts (including contingent debts) under the line, and the expense for realizing the creditor&rsquo;s rights (including but not
	limited to legal cost, attorney fee, notary fee and execution fee), and other losses and expenses caused to Party A due to the
	debtor&rsquo;s breach of contract. The guarantee period shall be from the date of effectiveness of the specific credit contract
	to two years after the expiration of the debt performance term specified in the credit contract (including acceleration of maturity
	of debt).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The specific credit-transferred object and amount are as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	( )
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(the transferee), amount: (converted into)
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(currency) (in words) ;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	( )
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(the transferee), amount: (converted into)
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(currency) (in words) ;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	( )
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(the transferee), amount: (converted into)
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(currency) (in words) ;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Article 2 Use of Credit Line
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.1&#9;Signature of this Contract by and between Party A and
	Party B shallnot constitute Party A&rsquo;s credit commitment to Party B. Party B shall present a written application to Party
	A for each specific credit business under the line, and Party A shall have the right to make its own decision on whether to grant
	to Party B a single credit under the line. If Party A agrees to grant the single credit through examination, Party A and Party
	B shall make and enter into a single credit contract additionally according to the business nature.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage185"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.2&#9;Preconditions for use of the credit line:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(1) Party B has handled the legal procedures
	(if any) for government license, approval, registration and delivery for the credit under this Contract according to relevant laws
	and regulations;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(2) The related security contract is effective
	(if any);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(3) Party B has paid off all the expenses
	related to this Contract (if any);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(4) Party B meets the credit conditions
	specified herein;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(5) There is no adverse change to the business
	and financial conditions of Party B and the guarantor (if any);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(6) There is no adverse change to Party
	B&rsquo;s repayment willingness and the guarantee willingness of the guarantor (if any);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	(7) Party B has no breach of this Contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.3&#9;Party A has the right to adjust the amount of the credit
	line or ask Party B to add guaranty where there is any change of the exchange rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.4&#9;Party A has the right to supervise the use of the credit
	line and the orientation of the credit funds, and Party B shall provide coordination.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.5&#9;If, prior to or during the use of the credit line, Party
	A&rsquo;s regulatory department requests Party A to control the credit scale or orientation due to change of national macro-control
	policies, or Party A is unable to grant to Party B to use the credit line for causes not attributable to Party A, Party A shall
	have the right to suspend or terminate the use of this credit line and cancel this Contract, for which Party B shall have no objection.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Article 3 Repayment
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3.1&#9;Party B shall open an account in Party A and deposit
	the amount repayable to this account prior to the specified date of repayment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3.2&#9;Party B shall perform the debt on time when each single
	credit within the line expires, or the related credit shall be deemed overdue or advances shall be made.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3.3&#9;Party B hereby irrevocably authorizes Party A to deduct
	the principal and interest of the due credit and related expenses from any and all accounts opened by Party B in any banking branch
	of Pingan Bank.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Article 4 Party B&rsquo;s Representations
	and Warranties
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.1&#9;Party B is a company with good reputation duly established
	and validly existing within the jurisdiction of the location where it is located. Party B has all corporate rights and has obtained
	the government license and approval for conducting its current business.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage186"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
